parameters.name: fields
parameters.description:
An optional comma-separated list (or array) of fields to show for each project.
     *                          Omitting this parameter or passing an empty value shows all fields.

operations.notes:
Returns a list of projects in Swarm that are visible to the current user. Administrators will see
               all projects, including private ones.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Project Name (is also used to generate the Project ID)

parameters.name: members
parameters.description: An array of project members.

parameters.name: subgroups
parameters.description: An optional array of project subgroups.

parameters.name: owners
parameters.description: An optional array of project owners.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: An optional project description.

parameters.name: private
parameters.description:
Private projects are visible only to Members, Moderators, Owners, and Administrators.
     *                          (Default: false)
     *

parameters.name: deploy
tests
parameters.description: Configuration for testing/continuous integration.

parameters.name: branches
parameters.description: Optional branch definitions for this project.

parameters.name: jobview
parameters.description: An optional jobview for associating certain jobs with this project.

parameters.name: emailFlags[change_email_project_users]
parameters.description: Email members, moderators and followers when a change is committed.

parameters.name: emailFlags[review_email_project_members]
parameters.description: Email members and moderators when a new review is requested.

operations.notes: Creates a new project in Swarm.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Project ID

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description:
An optional comma-separated list (or array) of fields to show for each project.
     *                          Omitting this parameter or passing an empty value shows all fields.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Project ID

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Project Name (changing the project name does not change the project ID)

parameters.name: members
parameters.description: An array of project members.

parameters.name: subgroups
parameters.description: An optional array of project subgroups.

parameters.name: owners
parameters.description: An optional array of project owners.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Your project description.

parameters.name: private
parameters.description:
Private projects are visible only to Members, Moderators, Owners, and Administrators.
     *                          (Default: false)
     *

parameters.name: deploy
tests
parameters.description: Configuration for testing/continuous integration.

parameters.name: branches
parameters.description: Optional branch definitions for this project.

parameters.name: jobview
parameters.description: A jobview for associating certain jobs with this project.

parameters.name: emailFlags[change_email_project_users]
parameters.description: Email members, moderators and followers when a change is committed.

parameters.name: emailFlags[review_email_project_members]
parameters.description: Email members and moderators when a new review is requested.

operations.notes:
Change the settings of a project in Swarm.
               If a project has owners set, only the owners can perform this action.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Project ID

operations.notes:
Mark a Swarm project as deleted. The project ID and name cannot be reused.
               If a project has owners set, only the owners can perform this action.
